This site uses cookies from Google to deliver its services and to analyze traffic.

[Learn more](https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies) Ok, Got it

```

ng generateng <schematic>[options]
```

check

```

ng gng <schematic>[options]
```

check

Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

### Sub-commands

This command has the following sub-commands

- [app-shell](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/app-shell)
- [application](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/application)
- [class](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/class)
- [component](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/component)
- [config](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/config)
- [directive](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/directive)
- [enum](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/enum)
- [environments](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/environments)
- [guard](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/guard)
- [interceptor](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/interceptor)
- [interface](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/interface)
- [library](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/library)
- [module](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/module)
- [pipe](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/pipe)
- [resolver](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/resolver)
- [service](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/service)
- [service-worker](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/service-worker)
- [web-worker](https://angular.dev/cli/cli/generate/web-worker)

## [Arguments](https://angular.dev/cli/generate\#arguments)

`schematic`

The \[collection:schematic\] to run.

Value Type `string`

## [Options](https://angular.dev/cli/generate\#options)

`defaults`

Disable interactive input prompts for options with a default.

Value Type `boolean` Default `false`

`dry-run`

Alias `d `

Run through and reports activity without writing out results.

Value Type `boolean` Default `false`

`force`

Force overwriting of existing files.

Value Type `boolean` Default `false`

`help`

Shows a help message for this command in the console.

Value Type `boolean`

`interactive`

Enable interactive input prompts.

Value Type `boolean` Default `true`
